atm6.ponder.atm_shard.atm_shard.header: How to get ATM Star Shards
atm6.ponder.creative_energy_cube.creativ: How to charge the Creative Energy Cube
Start by placing down two fully charged Ultimate Energy Cubes
After that, two more Ultimate Induction Providers
And finally, your empty Creative Energy Cube
atm6.ponder.atm_shard.atm_shard.text_3: Then place any item frame on the anvil
atm6.ponder.atm_shard.atm_shard.text_4: And finally place Mjollnir above the Anvil
atm6.ponder.atm_shard.atm_shard.text_1: Start by having a Bedrock Block as a base
